text: “Kodi sukudziwa (iwe, womvera wanzeru) kuti Allah akudziwa zakumwamba ndi zam’dziko lapansi? Sipakhala manong’onong’o a (anthu) atatu koma Iye Ngwachinayi wawo (ndi kudziwa kwake kosabisika chilichonse cha kumwamba ndi m’dziko), ngakhale a (anthu) asanu koma Iye Ngwachisanu ndi chimodzi wawo (mkudziwa Kwake), ngakhale ali ochepera kuposera pamenepa kapena ochulukira koma Iye ali nawo paliponse pomwe ati akhale (Allah ali nawo pamodzi mukudziwa Kwake kosabisika chilichonse), kenako adzawafotokozera pa tsiku la chiweruziro zimene adachita; ndithu Allah Ngodziwa chilichonse (mokwanira)
